    • giveReward

      public void giveReward(User user, int tokens)
      Gives tokens to a User entity. Checks if User is eligible for badges. Adds badge to user if so. Saves.
      Specified by:
      giveReward in interface UserServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      user - the user who will receive the tokens
      tokens - the tokens to be given to the user

    • takeReward

      public void takeReward(String username, int tokens)
      Takes tokens from a User entity. Checks if User is now eligible for badges. Adds badge to user if so. Saves.
      Specified by:
      takeReward in interface UserServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who will lose the tokens
      tokens - the tokens to be taken from the user
